Pre-Game Insights: Australia require a similarly huge win against Afghanistan, who are yet to win a match in this World Cup.
Aaron Finch may take the field despite a sore hamstring.
If Aaron Finch isn't able to take the field against Afghanistan, Cameron Green may make his place in the playing XI as Finch's replacement.
Afghanistan meanwhile have already been eliminated from the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia will start as favourites to win this match against Afghanistan.
The match will be broadcasted on the Star Sports network on TV, and on OTT Platform Hotstar for Indian viewers.
Others: The hosts and defending champions Australia are currently in a spot of bother in the ongoing T20 World Cup 2022, courtesy of a massive 89-run loss in their first match against New Zealand.
